deals.title: Whopper®
deals.itemDescription: A ¼ lb* of flame-grilled beef with juicy tomatoes, crisp lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.  *Weight based on pre-cooked patty. 670 Cal

deals.title: Pure Green Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Kale, spinach, mango, pineapple, banana and coconut water.

The Pure Green Smoothie is formulated with an abundant amount of kale and spinach which are rich in chlorophyll, vitamins and minerals. These vitamin rich vegetables are blended with the mango, banana and pineapple so the fiber is retained. The base of coconut water has a low sugar content and all of the ingredients paired together offers a taste that is off the charts.

deals.title: Pure Health Acai Bowl
deals.itemDescription:
Base: acai, banana, almond milk.

Toppings: sliced banana, hemp granola.

The Pure Health Acai Bowl is a blend of organic acai sourced from the amazon rainforest and blended with a touch of banana for a creamy base and topped with sliced banana and organic hemp granola.

deals.title: Mixed Berry Acai Bowl
deals.itemDescription:
Base:  Organic acai, strawberries, almond milk.

Toppings: blueberries, strawberries, hemp granola.

The Mixed Berry Acai Bowl is a blend of organic acai sourced from the amazon rainforest and blended with strawberries for a tangy base and topped with mixed berries and organic hemp granola.

deals.title: Banana Nut Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Banana, cashew butter, grass-fed whey protein, coconut butter and almond milk.

The Banana Nut Smoothie is a crowd favorite with a taste profile that rivals a milkshake. It has a nutty flavor profile and richness from cashew butter paired with a dash of coconut butter.

deals.title: Pure Pitaya Bowl
deals.itemDescription:
Base: organic pitaya (dragon fruit), mango, pineapple, coconut water

Toppings: blueberries, strawberries, hemp granola

The Pure Pitaya bowl is made with pitaya, a.k.a dragon fruit which gives the base a vibrant bright pink color and is combined with mango, pineapple and a touch of banana. This bowl is topped with blueberries, strawberries and organic hemp granola.

deals.title: Purple Haze Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Blueberries, strawberries, banana, plant-based protein, spirulina and coconut water.

The Purple Haze Smoothie contains spirulina as a key ingredient. Spirulina is a blue-green algae that is rich in chlorophyll and has been found to have anti-inflammatory properties and may even lower cholesterol. This smoothie uses plant-based vegan protein and is dairy-free.

deals.title: Activated Antioxidants™
deals.itemDescription: Support healthy digestion and protect your body from everyday stressors with a “berry” bright super-drink. This antioxidant-rich blend combines wild blueberry, goji, schisandra, and elderberry to ward off free radical damage, plus fruity red hibiscus and cacao to tantalize your taste buds. Gut-balancing probiotics and digestive enzymes are at work to help your body absorb all the nutrients from your food for peak health.

deals.title: Activated Lemonade®
deals.itemDescription: Kickstart healthy digestion with this zesty blend of digestive enzymes and probiotics for a strong gut and balanced body. It’s popping with refreshing citrus fruits, full-bodied yuzu, earthy turmeric, and an invigorating four-pepper blend that fuels your digestive fire and helps you absorb optimal nutrition from your food.

deals.title: Activated Protein®
deals.itemDescription: Give your digestive system a boost with a daily dose of essential protein. This creamy blend is packed with digestive enzymes for optimal nutrition absorption, a probiotic complex for a balanced gut, plus complete plant protein to nourish your body. Flavors of warm vanilla, spicy cinnamon, and sweet-tart goji berry add an unexpected twist to delight your taste buds.

deals.title: Activated Greens®
deals.itemDescription: Promote gut health and treat your body to a hearty dose of super greens with a refreshing citrus twist. This revitalizing blend is packed with a full spectrum of nutritious greens from land and sea, plus gut-balancing probiotics and digestive enzymes to help your body properly absorb all your food’s nutrients for optimal health.
